snippet: Readers respond to a column that criticized the American hurdler Lolo Jones and other events at the London Games.
lead_paragraph: Readers respond to a column that criticized the American hurdler Lolo Jones and other events at the London Games.

headline.seo: Putting Image Aside: Hurdler Lolo Jones’s Qualities
